version_description:
Thanks for supporting Alarmify!

■ Now you can wake up with your favorite Playlist, Albums or Artists!
■ Possibility of waking up by gradually increasing the volume of your favorite songs.
■ Complete restructuration: usability improvements.
■ Complete redesign of the app.
■ New languages: German, Portuguese, French and Italian.
■ Solve localization errors
■ Bug fixes

To continue improving it, fixing bugs or simply have any questions, please send an email to hello@alarmify.app

I hope you continue enjoying it!

Hi there!

■ Now you can use OTHER APPS while Alarmify is activated in background mode.
■ Also, you can LOCK the device.
■ Bug fixes.

Our prime goal is to progress continuously and make your experience better with every update.
To continue improving it, fixing bugs or simply have any questions, please send an email to hello@alarmify.app

I hope you continue enjoying it!

Hi there!

In this update you'll find:

■ Solve minor bugs

Our prime goal is to progress continuously and make your experience better with every update.
To continue improving it, fixing bugs or simply have any questions, please send an email to hello@alarmify.app

I hope you continue enjoying it!

此次更新将会增加以下功能

■ 新设计
■ 新特征
■ 程序错误修正

我们的主要目的是为了让您有更好的体验
如果您有任何问题，或对该软件的设置有意见，请您把问题发送到这个邮箱：hello@alarmify.app

希望您们喜欢!
